bucket.description: Name of the S3 bucket to use for uploading Lambda artifacts

functionName.description: Name to use for lambda. Defaults to context.projectName for clarity

profile.description: AWS profile name (which must be defined in the ~/.aws/credentials file) if AWS keys aren't defined as env vars

region.description: AWS region for identifying the ECS service to redeploy

roleArn.description: AWS IAM role ARN the Lambda will assume

handler.description: Lambda handler resolution expression. Defaults to main.handler

delayMs.description: Delay in millis to wait after creating the Lambda (hacky)

environment.description: Environment variables structured as an object
